definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge

sentences.english: Elevational and latitudinal trends were not pronounced.
sentences.chinese: 海拔和緯度的變化趨勢不明顯。

sentences.english: Other 5 monomers had no obvious effect on the expression of HIF-1.
sentences.chinese: 其它5種單體與對照比較無明顯作用趨勢。

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球變暖影響，青藏高原氣候呈現出暖幹趨勢。

sentences.english: And it illustrates the larger trend of home automation that is catching on among do-it-yourselfers.
sentences.chinese: 這說明家庭自動化的大趨勢就是自己動手。

sentences.english: The other major trend of the past few years has been the move to multi-core chips.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年的另一個主要趨勢是向多核芯片的過渡。

sentences.english: This paper can serve as the reference for the mills to select the board machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文試述紙板成形器的選用與發展趨勢，供同行參考。

sentences.english: Ecotype waterscape residential district is the trend of modern resident design.
sentences.chinese: 生態型水景住宅是當今住宅設計的一大趨勢。

sentences.english: The trend in the Arab world leans towards aridity.
sentences.chinese: 這個在阿拉伯世界的趨勢將趨向於乾燥。

sentences.english: The world multi-polarization trend continues to develop in a zigzagging process.
sentences.chinese: 世界多極化趨勢在曲折中發展。

sentences.english: Shenzhen's inhabitants' blood uric acid values are showing a tendency to increase.
sentences.chinese: 深圳人血尿酸值有逐漸上升趨勢。

sentences.english: There is a slow drift into crisis.
sentences.chinese: 有一種漸入危機的趨勢。

sentences.english: The early adopters and trend setters are moving away.
sentences.chinese: 早期的採用者和趨勢制定者正在逐步流失。

sentences.english: The future variety trend of land use is analyzed applying location quotient.
sentences.chinese: 並應用區位商數分析了未來土地利用方式的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: But after that period, the tea economy is in the recession.
sentences.chinese: 但自唐中後期以後，茶業經濟逐步呈現出衰退趨勢。

sentences.english: Self-publishing these days is increasingly a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 今自助出版越來越呈現兩極分化的趨勢。

sentences.english: In the perspective of time series, shares of foreign investment in most subordinate industry fluctuate remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 從時間趨勢看，多數行業中外資份額呈明顯波動狀態。

definition: one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
